translation.Modele a interação e a navegação de sist: Model the interaction and navigation of interactive systems
translation.É um modelo de interação e navegação ori: It is a usability-oriented interaction and navigation model that aims to improve the quality of use of interactive systems.
translation.Descreve o comportamento entre o usuário: Describes the behavior between the user and the computer system.
translation.Compreende nós de navegação e fluxos de: Understands navigation nodes and navigation flows between nodes.
translation.Representa mecanismos de usabilidade que: Represents usability mechanisms that impact interaction.
translation.Confira a tese que iniciou o: Check out the thesis that started the
translation.sua maneira de interagir e navegar o sis: your way of interacting and navigating the system
translation.na etapa de análise e projeto: at the analysis and design stage
translation.Somos alunos e professora da: We are students and teacher of
translation.e continua seus estudos como projeto de: and continues its studies as a research and technological development project at UFC
translation.Sua nova senha deve ser diferente das us: Your new password must be different from the ones you used previously.
translation.A senha deve ter pelo menos 8 caracteres: Password must be at least 8 characters long
translation.Não se preocupe, enviaremos as instruçõe: Don't worry, we will send you the recovery instructions.
translation.Enviamos um link para recuperação de sen: We have sent you a password recovery link.
translation.Senha deve ter no mínimo 8 caracteres: Password must be at least 8 characters long
translation.Termos de Uso e Política de Privacidade: Terms of Use and Privacy Policy
translation.Bem-vindo ao nosso sistema. Antes de uti: Welcome to our system. Before using it, please read the following terms of use and privacy policy. By continuing to use our system, you agree to these terms.
translation.Nós coletamos dados pessoais, tais como: We collect personal data such as name, surname, email address, gender, date of birth, occupation, and organization. These data are collected to identify and analyze the target audience of the system.
translation.Os dados pessoais coletados são armazena: The personal data collected is stored on our servers and will only be used for the purposes described in this privacy policy. We will not share this data with third parties without the user's prior consent, except as required by law.
translation.Tomamos medidas de segurança para proteg: We take security measures to protect the personal data collected in our system from loss, misuse, alteration, or destruction. However, no data transmission or storage method on the internet is 100% secure, and therefore, we cannot guarantee absolute security of personal data.
translation.Acesso, correção e exclusão dos dados pe: Access, Correction, and Deletion of Personal Data
translation.De acordo com a Lei Geral de Proteção de: Under the General Data Protection Law (Law No. 13.709/18), the user can request access to the personal data we collect, as well as request corrections or deletions of that data. The user can also request limitations or portability of that data, as well as withdraw consent they have provided to us. To make a request, the user can contact us via the email provided in our system.
translation.Nós utilizamos cookies e outras tecnolog: We use cookies and other tracking technologies in our system to improve the user experience and provide a more personalized service. The cookies we use are related to account creation, managing the registration process and general administration, and logging into the system, to avoid the need to log in again when you visit a new page. These cookies will be deleted when you log out of the system.
translation.Em alguns casos especiais, podemos també: In some special cases, we may also use cookies provided by trusted third parties. The section below outlines which third-party cookies you may encounter through this site.
translation.YouTube é um serviço de visualização de: YouTube is a video content viewing service provided by Google LLC that allows this site to embed such content into its pages.
translation.Google Fonts é um serviço de visualizaçã: Google Fonts is a font rendering service provided by Google LLC that allows this site to embed such content into its pages.
translation.Atualização dos termos de uso e política: Update of Terms of Use and Privacy Policy
translation.Reservamo-nos o direito de atualizar est: We reserve the right to update these terms of use and privacy policy at any time. The new version of the terms will be published on our system and will take effect immediately after publication.
translation.O nome só deve conter caracteres: The name should only contain characters
translation.O nome deve ter no mínimo 3 caracteres: The name must be at least 3 characters long
translation.O nome deve ter no máximo 100 caracteres: The name must be at most 100 characters long
translation.O email deve ter no máximo 255 caractere: Email must be at most 255 characters long
translation.A organização deve ter no máximo 100 car: Organization must be at most 100 characters long
